Thank you for your interest in contributing to OpenDeAI-Models! Follow these steps to submit your AI model.

ğŸ“Œ Submission Steps

1ï¸âƒ£ Fork this repository and clone it locally.
2ï¸âƒ£ Navigate to the correct category (models/nlp/, models/vision/, etc.).
3ï¸âƒ£ Create a new folder for your model.
4ï¸âƒ£ Include a MODEL_INFO.md file (Use this template).
5ï¸âƒ£ Submit a pull request with a meaningful commit message.
